scheme

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheme.Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains the implementation of Blocks, which are part of Schemes.
    Since:
    2017-04-28
    Author:
    Stupinský Šimon

    • Method Detail

      • addPort

        public void addPort(Port newPort)
        Add Port to the Block, accoording to its type (input/output). Sets the all needed attributes of the Block.
        Parameters:
        newPort - Port for store.

      • addFormula

        public void addFormula(Formula newFormula)
        Add Formula to the Block, formula can be overriden by the newest formula.
        Parameters:
        newFormula - Formula for store.

      • removePort

        public void removePort(Port toRemove)
        Remove port from the Block, from the relevant Vector of Ports, according to its type (input/output).
        Parameters:
        toRemove - Port to remove.
